input: I want to group multiple requests to check lock request specifications and event codes.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContractLockRequestEventSpecifications HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContractLockRequests HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--
